Description:
Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

Author: Brandon George (blog post), Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((query_name="www.ip.cn" OR query_name="l2.io") (query_name="*api.2ip.ua*" OR query_name="*api.bigdatacloud.net*" OR query_name="*api.ipify.org*" OR query_name="*bot.whatismyipaddress.com*" OR query_name="*canireachthe.net*" OR query_name="*checkip.amazonaws.com*" OR query_name="*checkip.dyndns.org*" OR query_name="*curlmyip.com*" OR query_name="*db-ip.com*" OR query_name="*edns.ip-api.com*" OR query_name="*eth0.me*" OR query_name="*freegeoip.app*" OR query_name="*geoipy.com*" OR query_name="*getip.pro*" OR query_name="*icanhazip.com*" OR query_name="*ident.me*" OR query_name="*ifconfig.io*" OR query_name="*ifconfig.me*" OR query_name="*ip-api.com*" OR query_name="*ip.360.cn*" OR query_name="*ip.anysrc.net*" OR query_name="*ip.taobao.com*" OR query_name="*ip.tyk.nu*" OR query_name="*ipaddressworld.com*" OR query_name="*ipapi.co*" OR query_name="*ipconfig.io*" OR query_name="*ipecho.net*" OR query_name="*ipinfo.io*" OR query_name="*ipip.net*" OR query_name="*ipof.in*" OR query_name="*ipv4.icanhazip.com*" OR query_name="*ipv4bot.whatismyipaddress.com*" OR query_name="*ipv6-test.com*" OR query_name="*ipwho.is*" OR query_name="*jsonip.com*" OR query_name="*myexternalip.com*" OR query_name="*seeip.org*" OR query_name="*wgetip.com*" OR query_name="*whatismyip.akamai.com*" OR query_name="*whois.pconline.com.cn*" OR query_name="*wtfismyip.com*")) NOT (process_path="*\\opera.exe" OR process_path="*\\safari.exe" OR process_path="*\\whale.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe") OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") (process_path="*\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="*\\msedgewebview2.exe")) OR process_path="*\\maxthon.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*" process_path="*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe" (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe")) OR process_path="*\\seamonkey.exe" OR process_path="*\\vivaldi.exe" OR process_path="*\\brave.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe"))
